name: Ghoulish Pipedream
description:
A man named Larry breaks into an abandoned mansion, where he unexpectedly meets an nameless Ghost. The pair must navigate the mansion, work together to solve puzzles and ultimately help each other to achieve their goals.

Play as either:

  • Larry Cornelius Fitzpatrick III, an aspiring ghost hunter on his quest to prove to the world that ghosts are real.
  • A Ghost tormented by being unable to remember his past.
Controls Back Alley Games

      Elliot Wood 2D & 3D Art

      Gatis Silnieks Programming

      Kim Peters Writing

      Oliver Britland 3D Art

      Xav Benbow  Design
